title: U.S. Flag's History Inspire Mixologists To Get Creative
teaser: The Smithsonian held a contest for a drink to celebrate U.S.-British friendship â€” after the attack 200 years ago. The winner: Gunpowder Cream: a mix of rum, English tea and maple syrup.
